modName: Ilatria and the Tomb of the Old
summary:
Dungeon, Player Home, Custom Boss Monsters and more!
A very atmospheric Hardcore dungeon for those who can't find any challenge in the vanilla game.
From the creator of "Ilatria the Standalone Nord Female Follower".
Torch required! (Brighter version coming in future patches)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/FZ4eDCb.png[/img][/center]

[heading][color=green]--- News ---[/color][/heading]
My newest projects WIP thread can be found here:

[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1335327-wip-deadly-preview-and-brainstorming]D.E.A.D.L.Y or Distinguished Essence Arrow Delivery Logistics for You.[/url]
(Final name pending)

This mod can now be considered as finished.

I've lost the interest to improve it any further.
I hope there aren't any game breaking bugs left in it. At least I haven't found any even though I've went through the whole dungeon and player home countless of times with pre-existing characters and fresh new ones.

- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30435/]My follower mod[/url] now has a optional version which moves Ilatria (the co-owner of the Palace) to your new player home and considers the place her home. Change was made mainly for convenience and the mods lore in mind.
- Patch 0.93 is now out. No brighter version available. Sorry!
- Note that the player home is always well lit. Dark and bright versions only define the dungeons lighting.

Change log / known issues
- Added a new teleport spell so you can get out of the house, check the master bedroom for the tome.
- [s]Merchants in the home refuse to sell anything, this will be looked at.[/s] Fixed (they sell 23 hours a day)!
- Converted the main file to ESM and added an update file (TotO_update.esp). Have both activated.
- Script of the spell is fixed
- Palace of Groizen'Zor is now officially accessible!
- Found an instance where Prototype wouldn't attack the player. Possible fix implemented, requires more testing.

I didn't want to spoil it for you guys, so these are the only screenshots you're getting ;)

[heading][color=green]--- Requirements and Recommendations ---[/color][/heading]
Requires: The Elder Scrolls IV: Skyrim - Dawnguard DLC
I recommend: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30435/]Ilatria - Nord Female Standalone Follower[/url]

[heading][color=green]--- The Dungeon ---[/color][/heading]
Journey in the depths of the Tomb of the Old, a very old Nord crypt [b][u]near Riverwood[/u][/b] to start your mission. As you enter, you notice a few journals laying on the table, what's that about?
The story, background of the dungeon and what it holds will unlock as you read the journals that you find inside.
Followers will not follow you after the first part of the dungeon. This is intended. Uncovering the secrets of Groizen'Zor Temple is something that you must do on your own.
The mod includes a fully furnished Dwemer themed player home in the deepest corner under Skyrim. How do you get there? Follow the story and find out!
As hard the dungeon might be, the greater the reward, unlock Groizen'Zor the underground Dwemer Palace to use as your home.

[heading][color=green]--- The House ---[/color][/heading]
The player house is located deep within the earths crust and is only accessible through completing the dungeon.
Groizen'Zor Palace is well hidden from the outside world, it's fully follower compatible, contains every crafting station and a lot of storage space!

The palace includes several rooms. Temple area, main lounge, room for a possible house-carl, master bedroom, crafting lounge that also has it's own bar, barmaid and a fence that enjoys the safety that your home provides. And like all great palaces, there's a bathing hall. The bathing hall is huge, features deep enough water to swim in, a jumping platform near the ceiling, two bathing beauties and more mead than you could ever drink! And what's a home without it's own garden? Groizen'Zor palace has it's own little ecosystem inside a cave with lots of herbs for you to pick up, it's also connected to your home!

This mod was originally started as a player home for my own use, but has since developed into something much more.

Explore and find all that the palace has to offer (read: treasure)!

[heading][color=red]--- ! WARNING ! ---[/color][/heading]
This dungeon is very hard and very dark. Bring torches, a high level and well equipped character! Designed for those who do not find challenge in the vanilla game anymore.
(A brighter version now available in optional files!)

[heading][color=green]--- Installation ---[/color][/heading]
1. Use NMM
2. or Install manually by extracting the contents of the RAR-archive (two files) in to your SkyrimData folder


[heading][color=green]--- Credits ---[/color][/heading]
Thanks to Ghaunadaur for the script to make Palace Merchants inventory to reset!
Biggest thanks to Bethesda for creating the immensely epic game and of course for releasing Creation Kit for us modders to use!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4825044/?]mysticentity[/url] and The Creation Kids for the beautiful '[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free[/url]' logo
author: Sdesser
